member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.Controllers.EventsController.Post(System.String,VenimusAPIs.ViewModels.CreateEvent)
member.summary: Allows you to create a new event for your group.
member.remarks:
Sample request:
POST /api/groups/YorkCodeDojo/events { "slug" : "Oct2019" "title" : "Game of Life - Oct 2019", "description" : "Tonight we will work in pairs implementing the **classic Game Of Life**" "location" : "Room 12" "startTime" : "2019-12-12 18:30" "endTime" : "2019-12-12 21:00" }
member.returns: The route to the created event

member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.Controllers.EventsController.Put(System.String,System.String,VenimusAPIs.ViewModels.UpdateEvent)
member.summary: Allows you to amend the details of an existing event
member.remarks:
Sample request:
PUT /api/groups/YorkCodeDojo/events/12345 { "slug" : "Oct2019" "title" : "Game of Life - Oct 2019", "description" : "Tonight we will work in pairs implementing the **classic Game Of Life**" "location" : "Room 12" "startTime" : "2019-12-12 18:30" "endTime" : "2019-12-12 21:00" "host" : "E Betteridge" "speaker" : "J Betteridge" }
member.response: The group or event does not exist.

member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.Controllers.EventsController.Get(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Allows you to retrieve the details of an event
member.response: Group or Event does not exist.

member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.Controllers.GroupsController.Post(VenimusAPIs.ViewModels.CreateGroup)
member.summary: Allows you to create a new group
member.remarks:
Sample request:
POST /api/groups { "slug" : "YorkCodeDojo", "name" : "York Cod eDojo", "isActive" : true, "slackChannelName" : "YorkCodeDojo", "logoInBase64" : "1111", "description" : "Improve your code by practice." }
member.returns: The route to the created group

member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.Controllers.GroupsController.Put(System.String,VenimusAPIs.ViewModels.UpdateGroup)
member.summary: Allows you to update an existing group
member.remarks:
Sample request:
PUT /api/groups/YorkCodeDojo { "slug" : "YorkCodeDojo", "name" : "York Cod eDojo", "isActive" : true, "slackChannelName" : "YorkCodeDojo", "logoInBase64" : "1111", "description" : "Improve your code by practice." }
member.returns: The route to the created group

member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.Controllers.GroupsController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Allows you to retrieve the details of a group

member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.Controllers.GroupsController.Get
member.summary: Allows you to retrieve the list of all groups
member.returns: An array of ListGroup view models

member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.Controllers.GroupsController.Delete(System.String)
member.summary: Allows you to delete an existing group

member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.Controllers.Groups_MembersController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Allows you to retrieve the members of a group

member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.Controllers.ActiveGroupsController.Get
member.summary: Allows you request the list of active groups

member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.Controllers.FutureEventsController.Get
member.summary: Allows you request the list of future events. Maximum of 10 per group.

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.Id
member.summary: The unique internal ID for the event

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.Slug
member.summary: The unique external id for the event. For example May2019

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.GroupId
member.summary: The internal ID of the group to which this event belongs

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.GroupSlug
member.summary: The external ID of the group to which this event belongs

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.GroupName
member.summary: The name of the group the event belongs to

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.Title
member.summary: The title of the event, for example March 2019 Meetup. Must be unique for the group.

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.Description
member.summary: A description of the event, in markdown format.

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.Location
member.summary: The location of the event, for example York Minster, Room 201 York St John University

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.StartTimeUTC
member.summary: Date and time the event starts

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.EndTimeUTC
member.summary: Date and time the event ends. Must be after the StartTime

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.Members
member.summary: Attendees of this group

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.EventAttendees.SignedUp
member.summary: Are they still signed up

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.EventAttendees.Attended
member.summary: Did they attend the event?

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.EventAttendees.Host
member.summary: Are they organising the event

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.EventAttendees.Speaker
member.summary: Are they presenting at the event

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.EventAttendees.DietaryRequirements
member.summary: Any Dietary Requirements the user has

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.EventAttendees.MessageToOrganiser
member.summary: Free format message to the organiser

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.EventAttendees.NumberOfGuests
member.summary: The number of unregistered guest the person is bringing

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Group.Id
member.summary: The unique internal ID of this group

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Group.IsActive
member.summary: Is this group still actively running events?

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Group.Slug
member.summary: The unique external id for the group. For example YorkCodeDojo

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Group.Name
member.summary: The unique name for the group / community. For example York Code Dojo

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Group.Description
member.summary: A description of the group in markdown

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Group.Logo
member.summary: The group's logo.

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Group.Members
member.summary: Members of this group

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Group.SlackChannelName
member.summary: The name of this groups slack channel

member.summary: Unique ID of the user

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Group.GroupMember.IsAdministrator
member.summary: Are they an administrator of the group?

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.User.Id
member.summary: The internal ID for the user.

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.User.EmailAddress
member.summary: The email address which also links all the social media accounts together.

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.User.Pronoun
member.summary: The users preferred personal pronon. e.g. Him

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.User.Fullname
member.summary: The user's fullname. e.g David Betteridge

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.User.DisplayName
member.summary: The user's name within the system. Ideally the same as their slack name. e.g. DavidB (Has to be unique)

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.User.Bio
member.summary: The user's biography. This can include their place of work/student, any interests etc. Visible to all signed in members

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.User.ProfilePicture
member.summary: The user's profile picture

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.User.Identities
member.summary: The user's social media identities

member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.UserControllers.UserConnectedController.Post
member.summary: Called once the user has connected to the frontend. This ensures that they exist in the database.

member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.UserControllers.UserDetailsController.Get
member.summary: Allows the current user to retrieve their personal profile

member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.UserControllers.UserDetailsController.Put(VenimusAPIs.ViewModels.UpdateMyDetails)
member.summary: Allows the current user to update their personal profile
member.remarks:
Sample request:
PUT /api/user { "pronoun" : "Him" "Fullname" : "David Betteridge", "DisplayName" : "David B", "Bio" : "I am me", "profilePictureAsBase64" : "123123123", }

member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.UserControllers.UserEventsController.Get
member.summary: Allows the current user to retrieve all the future events they have signed up to.
member.returns: Array of the ViewAllMyEventRegistrations view model

member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.UserControllers.UserGroupsController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Allows you to retrieve the details of a group
member.response: Group does not exist or the user is not a member

member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.UserControllers.UserGroupsController.Get
member.summary: Allows the current user to see the groups they are a member of
member.returns: An array of ListMyGroups view models

member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.UserControllers.UserGroupsController.Post(VenimusAPIs.ViewModels.JoinGroup)
member.summary: Allows the current user to join a group
member.returns: The route to the created group

member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.UserControllers.UserGroupsController.DELETE(System.String)
member.summary: Allows the current user to leave a group

member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.UserControllers.UserGroupsEventsController.Post(System.String,VenimusAPIs.ViewModels.RegisterForEvent)
member.summary: Allows the current user to sign up to an event
member.remarks:
Sample request:
POST /api/user/groups/YorkCodeDojo/Events { "eventSlug" : "Nov2019", "numberOfGuest" : 1, "dietaryRequirements" : "Milk free", "messageToOrganiser" : "I might be 10 minutes late" }
member.returns: The route to the created group

member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.UserControllers.UserGroupsEventsController.Put(System.String,System.String,VenimusAPIs.ViewModels.AmendRegistrationForEvent)
member.summary: Allows the current user to update their registration for an event
member.remarks:
Sample request:
PUT /api/user/groups/YorkCodeDojo/Events/Nov2019 { "numberOfGuest" : 1, "dietaryRequirements" : "Milk free", "messageToOrganiser" : "I might be 10 minutes late" }

member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.UserControllers.UserGroupsEventsController.Delete(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Allows the current user to decline attending an event
member.response: Group or Event does not exist.

member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.UserControllers.UserGroupsEventsController.Get(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Allows the current user to retrieve their registration details for an event
member.response: Group or Event does not exist.
